doc.name: FlatScalarTokenRepresentativeConcept
doc.description: A finite concept in an ontology that represents a flat set of infinite concepts that map to an interval of scalar numbers.
doc.author: Charles Shelton
doc.property: The value of the left endpoint of the scalar interval.
Indicates whether or not the interval is closed on its left endpoint.
The value of the right endpoint of the scalar interval.
Indicates whether or not the interval is closed on its right endpoint.
